(Simplified: 耧)
Chinese Definition:
①播種用的農具，前邊牽引，後邊人扶，可同時完成開溝和下種兩項工作：耬車。耬犁。耬播(用耬播種。亦稱“耩地”)。

耬字的基本解释

lóu
见“耧”。

耬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lóu］
［《廣韻》落侯切，平侯，來。］
“耧1”的繁体字。
(1)耧车。
(2)覆种。

耬字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【耒字部】　耬； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页964第22
〔古文〕?【廣韻】落侯切【集韻】郞侯切，?音婁。【玉篇】犂也。【正字通】下種具。一曰耬車，狀如三足犂，中置耬斗，藏種以牛駕之，一人執耬，且行且搖，種乃隨下。崔實云：漢趙過敎民耕殖，其法，三犂共一牛，一人將之，下種，挽耬皆取備焉。日種一頃。按此卽耬車也。見齊民要術。　又【集韻】朗口切，婁上聲。耕畦謂之耬。　【集韻】或作䅹。

[Not concentrated] [Lei word department] 　耧; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 964 22
[Ancient text]? [Guangyun] Luo Houqie [Jiyun] Yin Houqie,? Yin Lou. [Jade articles] Plow also. 【Zhengzitong】Next planting tools. One said that the columbine is like a three-legged plow, with a columbine in the middle, and the Tibetan seed is driven by an ox. Cui Shiyun: During the Han Dynasty and the Zhao Dynasty, the people were cultivated and reproduced. The method was three ploughs and one cow. One person took it, planted it, and picked up columbine. One hectare per day. Click here to go to the car too. See Qi Min Yaoshu.　[Jiyun] again, loudly and loudly, Lou said. Cultivation is called columbine.　【Jiyun】Or make you.
